overview: An armed robbery with serious consequences... for the criminals. Nico is screwed as soon as he is arrested, then in jail he faces a series of interrogations, tickle torture, penetrative investigations and abuse from fellow inmates. They want Andy to spill the beans and confess where he's hidden what was stolen - he is interrogated, beaten, tickled to his limits and forced to bare his arse. During a riot, one of the wardens is overpowered and left at the mercy of the prisoners. Picked on by brutal prisoners, Andy is made to lick feet and is used by the others to fuck and piss on.
title: Prisonboys
